title: A Closer Look: Jeff Sessions’ Confirmation Hearings / Seth Interviews Kellyanne Conway
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the first confirmation hearings for President-elect Donald Trump's cabinet appointments, beginning with nominee for attorney general, Jeff Sessions. Then, Seth sits down with incoming White House councelor Kellyanne Conway about Donald Trump's transition to the White House, as well as some breaking allegations about Trump's relationship with Russia.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
